Package application.views

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColorChangeable
    Is implemented by views that need their colour changed based on the current colour blind mode.
    Disableable
    Is implemented by views that can be disabled.
    UIComponent
    The Interface UIComponent.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardDeckView
    Card deck views display the back size of cards.
    CardRowView
    Card row views are the rows of cards that can be seen on the playing field.
    CardView
    Card view can be extended by other classes to create card visuals.
    FrontCardView
    Displays the front side of a card.
    GameView
    Game view contains the entire visualisation of the game after the lobby.
    GemView
    Display of every gem in the game.
    LobbyView
    The Class LobbyView.
    MainMenuView
    View for the main menu.
    ManualWindowView
    View for the manual window.
    NobleView
    Displays nobles.
    OpponentView
    View with opponent information seen on the left side of the game view.
    PlayerView
    This is the view with the player's own information.
    PlayingFieldView
    The playing field view is the section that contains all the cards, nobles, tokens, etc.
    PopUpWindowView
    General pop-up view view that can be used to communicate information to a player.
    RearCardView
    Displays the rear side of a card.
    ReturnTokensView
    The Class ReturnTokensView.
    TokenView
    Display of every token in the game.
